channel.title: Comments on: how much to spend on (cat)books?

item.title: By: Qi Zhu
item.dc:creator: Qi Zhu
item.description:
+1 on "One of the problems with my master course on algebraic geometry is that the students are categorical virgins."
From the experiences of my friends, this is the problem that so many students encounter when they first try to take a class on algebraic geometry.
item.content:encoded:
+1 on “One of the problems with my master course on algebraic geometry is that the students are categorical virgins.”

From the experiences of my friends, this is the problem that so many students encounter when they first try to take a class on algebraic geometry.
